alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Geauga (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued March 18 at 3:28PM EDT until March 19 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches, especially in far-northern Geauga and central Ashtabula Counties. Lesser snow accumulations expected elsewhere. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Geauga and Ashtabula Inland counties. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult at times with slippery road conditions and poor visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Maximum snowfall rates are expected to reach 1 to 2 inches per hour after sunset through early Sunday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
